Package controllerGui

Class HomePageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerGui.HomePageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreen
    public class HomePageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreen
    Home page GUI controller, implements Screen interface Home page for ALL system users, which changes according to user role
    Author:
    Lidor

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize the main menu screen for the user. It sets the visibility of the buttons and labels according to the role of the current connected user. It also sets up the view for the personal messages and initializes the common data from the database. It also activate the timeout.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface IScreen

      • initializeBtnAndLbl

        private void initializeBtnAndLbl()
        Initialize the buttons visibility default to false. Initialize the header also

      • initializePersonalMessages

        Initialize the personal messages if needed
        Parameters:
        currentRole - role of current logged in user

        private void toggleBtnsVisible​(javafx.scene.control.Button[] btns,
                               boolean setToVisible)
        Change all buttons visibility at once
        Parameters:
        btns - btns to affect on
        setToVisible - true for visible, false to not

        T - general button
        Parameters:
        btn - button to act on
        btnText - text to put on button
        tooltiptext - tool tip for button
        scName - scene name enum

      • logOutAction

        private void logOutAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Parameters:
        event - current event
